name: HappyVille (itch)
description:
Congratulations on winning a free vacation to Happyville!

We're glad to have you in our village for your stay!

Voted friendliest village 3 years in a row, you'll find out why everybody who leaves can't stop talking about us.

This version is days 0 to 3 of an intended 6 days pending remaking.

Includes around an hour of content and fishing side content.
